_sText:
fy_starfire
Starfire is set on a spinning space station that features jump platforms, a rotating satellite, slightly reduced gravity and random weapons. At the beginning of each round, every player receives either an AUG, SG552 or a Scout + a random pistol except USP and Deagle. They can then try to use jumppads, the central flank beneath the satellite or one of the side flanks to get to the enemy base. Taking the southern flank provides you with no cover by the central satellite while the southern route does provide you with cover but also makes you easily visible because of the bright spinning circles around the map. There are AWPs next to each spawn that you can only pick up with haphazardous strafe jumps that leave you extremely vulnerable to enemy fire. Textures are by Philip K. For the 3D Sky, I used some NASA pictures. More projects at acidmaps.net. If you are running this map on your server, please tell me so I can join and gather feedback regarding gameplay and possibly bugs.
